snippet: The Japanese economy grew at a tepid rate of 1.0 percent in the final quarter of 2013, heightening concerns that Japan’s recovery may not be strong enough to weather further challenges expected this year.
abstract: Japanese economy grew at tepid rate of 1.0 percent in final quarter of 2013, heightening concerns that nation’s recovery may not be strong enough to weather further challenges expected in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese economy grew at a tepid rate of 1.0 percent in the final quarter of 2013, heightening concerns that Japan’s recovery may not be strong enough to weather further challenges expected this year.

headline.main: Japan’s Growth Slows, Raising Concerns About Obstacles That Lie Ahead
headline.print_headline: Japan’s Growth Slows, Raising Concerns About Obstacles That Lie Ahead
